title: Onboard a New Retailer
description: A new retailer wants to start carrying a wholesaler's products. An agent must set them up as a new customer.

tasks.description: Gather the new retailer's business information and credit application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all the necessary documentation.

tasks.description: Run a credit check and establish a credit limit for the new retailer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The credit check is approved, and a credit limit is set.

tasks.description: Create a new customer account in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new account.

tasks.description: Provide the retailer with access to the online ordering portal and send them a welcome packet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the portal login and sends the welcome information.
